content: **yarn** lana grossa solo cashmere 110 120 0 yards 110 0 m /25g 1 skein nr 117 mc taupe and 1 skein nr 109 cc beige **needles** size 4 3 5mm circular knitting needles 60cm or 80cm and dpn 4 stitch marker 2 buttons **gauge** 23m stitches = 4 10 cm in st st adjust needle sizes to obtain correct gauge if necessary **size** newborn
